00040 #ifndef PATHUTILITIES_H
00041 #define PATHUTILITIES_H
00042 
00043 #include <navigation_trajectory_common/FrameWithId.h>
00044 #include <vector>
00045 
00046 inline double perpendicularDistance(const FrameWithId& point,
00047         const FrameWithId& linePoint1, const FrameWithId& linePoint2) {
00048 
00049     double x0 = point.p.x();
00050     double y0 = point.p.y();
00051 
00052     double x1 = linePoint1.p.x();
00053     double y1 = linePoint1.p.y();
00054 
00055     double x2 = linePoint2.p.x();
00056     double y2 = linePoint2.p.y();
00057 
00058     double dist = fabs((x2 - x1)*(y1 - y0)-(x1 - x0)*(y2 - y1)) /
00059             sqrt((x2 - x1)*(x2 - x1)+(y2 - y1)*(y2 - y1));
00060 
00061     return dist;
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 inline void prunePath(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path,
00066         const FrameWithId& point,
00067         std::vector<FrameWithId>& prunedPath) {
00068 
00069     std::vector<FrameWithId> localPath;
00070     localPath = path;
00071 
00072     double dmax = perpendicularDistance(localPath[0], localPath[1], point);
00073     unsigned int index = 1;
00074 
00075     for (unsigned int i = 1; i < localPath.size(); i++) {
00076         double d = perpendicularDistance(localPath[i - 1], localPath[i],
00077                 point);
00078         if (d <= dmax) {
00079             index = i;
00080             dmax = d;
00081         }
00082     }
00083 
00084     prunedPath.push_back(point);
00085     prunedPath.insert(prunedPath.end(), localPath.begin() + index, localPath.end());
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 #endif  /* PATHUTILITIES_H */
